converter_paths._comment: Directoires are relative to your vscode ${workspaceFolder} directory

merger_paths._comment: Full or relative path to AoMR trigger_data.xml file

doxygen_html_paths._comment: Directoires are relative to your vscode ${workspaceFolder} directory. Output_file is the path/<name> of the output file. The scripts outputs three files, a .json, .xs, and .js
